title: Xbox 360 Kinect Perfect Range Anti-Slip Gaming Mat
transcripts: Hi, I'm Katie and this is the perfect range game mat for the Xbox 360 Kinect by CTA Digital. This one-of-a-kind mat measures four-and-a-half feet by six-and-a-half feet. The mat outlines the one and two player gaming zones to get the best interaction and body recognition between the gamer and the Kinect camera. So you'll know exactly where to stand and where not to stand when using the perfect range game mat. To start using your perfect range game mat, place it four feet away from the Kinect camera for the best possible range. At this distance, you can see your gaming area, and the Kinect camera can see you. Now, you'll never find yourself outside of the gaming zone or misaligned with the Kinect camera. Not only does the mat enhance your gaming experience by keeping you in the Kinect camera's range, but it also has a comfortable foam padding that protects your floors or carpet from scuff marks. This mat is made with a durable, stylishly designed anti-slip material that keeps the mat in place so you will feel safe when your gaming starts to heat up. Storage of the perfect range mat is simple and easy. Just fold it up neatly and put it in the included bag. You can tuck it away almost anywhere. The mat is compatible with all Xbox 360 Kinect games. The perfect range game mat by CTA Digital. Stay in range while playing Xbox 360 Kinect games.
